languages.text: "Я не все помню. Кажется... Мы по кому-то стреляли. Поверх голов. Кто-то проявил к нам недостаточное почтение. Потом вы сказали, что водить шаттл — это просто, и вы готовы поспорить на свой Патент, что сможете доставить нас на корабль. Еще мы кого-то раздели и сожгли его одежду, потому что она оскорбляла взор Великого... Паленым до сих пор пахнет".

"I don't remember all of it. I think... We shot at some people. Over their heads. Someone didn't offer us the required amount of respect. Then you said that flying a shuttle was easy and that you would bet your Warrant that you could get us to the ship. We also stripped a man and burnt his clothes because the sight of them offended the Exalted One... I can still smell the singed fibres now."
languages.original_text: "Я не все помню. Кажется... Мы по кому-то стреляли. Поверх голов. Кто-то проявил к нам недостаточное почтение. Потом вы сказали, что водить шаттл — это просто, и вы готовы поспорить на свой Патент, что сможете доставить нас на корабль. Еще мы кого-то раздели и сожгли его одежду, потому что она оскорбляла взор Великого... Паленым до сих пор пахнет".

Then you said that flying a shuttle was easy and that you would bet your Warrant that you could get us to the ship. We also stripped a man and burnt his clothes because the sight of them offended the Exalted One... I can still smell the singed fibres now."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “有些部分我已经记不清了。我记得……咱们好像是开枪了，往天上开的枪，因为有人对咱们的态度不太尊重。在那之后，你还说开穿梭机简直是小菜一碟，你说你敢拿你的授状打赌，肯定能把咱们带回飞船。后来咱们还扒光了某个人的衣服，烧掉了，因为衣服的图案对至高无上的神皇不敬……我现在还能闻到纤维烧焦的味道。”
languages.original_text: "I don't remember all of it. I think... We shot at some people. Over their heads. Someone didn't offer us the required amount of respect. Then you said that flying a shuttle was easy and that you would bet your Warrant that you could get us to the ship. We also stripped a man and burnt his clothes because the sight of them offended the Exalted One... I can still smell the singed fibres now."

traits.locale_text: “有些部分我已经记不清了。我记得……咱们好像是开枪了，往天上开的枪，因为有人对咱们的态度不太尊重。在那之后，你还说开穿梭机简直是小菜一碟，你说你敢拿你的许可证打赌，肯定能把咱们带回飞船。后来咱们还扒光了某个人的衣服，烧掉了，因为衣服的图案对至高无上的神皇不敬……我现在还能闻到纤维烧焦的味道。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「全部は覚えていない。たぶん…何人か撃った。頭上から。誰かがあたしたちに敬意を払わなかったんだ。それから、あんたはシャトルなんて簡単に操縦できる、あたしたちを船まで連れて行けるかどうか、自分の令状を賭けると言ったんだ。あたしたちはまた、ある男を裸にし、その服を燃やした。その姿がエグザルテッド・ワンを怒らせたからだって…焼け焦げた繊維の匂いが今でもするよ」
languages.original_text: "I don't remember all of it. I think... We shot at some people. Over their heads. Someone didn't offer us the required amount of respect. Then you said that flying a shuttle was easy and that you would bet your Warrant that you could get us to the ship. We also stripped a man and burnt his clothes because the sight of them offended the Exalted One... I can still smell the singed fibres now."

traits.locale_text: 「全部は覚えていない。たぶん…何人か撃った。頭上から。誰かがあたしたちに敬意を払わなかったんだ。それから、あんたはシャトルなんて簡単に操縦できる、あたしたちを船まで連れて行けるかどうか、自分の令状を賭けると言ったんだ。あたしたちはまた、ある男を裸にし、その服を燃やした。その姿がエグザルテッド・ワンを怒らせたからだって…焼け焦げた繊維の匂いが今でもするよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «No recuerdo todo. Creo que... disparamos contra algunas personas. Por encima de sus cabezas. Por lo visto, habían mostrado un respeto insuficiente. Después dijo que pilotar una lanzadera era pan comido y se apostó la patente a que lograba traernos a la nave. También desnudamos a un hombre y quemamos sus ropas porque su aspecto era una afrenta contra el Exaltado... todavía puedo oler a tela quemada».
languages.original_text: "I don't remember all of it. I think... We shot at some people. Over their heads. Someone didn't offer us the required amount of respect. Then you said that flying a shuttle was easy and that you would bet your Warrant that you could get us to the ship. We also stripped a man and burnt his clothes because the sight of them offended the Exalted One... I can still smell the singed fibres now."

traits.locale_text: «No recuerdo todo. Creo que... disparamos contra algunas personas. Por encima de sus cabezas. Por lo visto, habían mostrado un respeto insuficiente. Después dijo que pilotar una lanzadera era pan comido y se apostó la patente a que lograba traernos a la nave. También desnudamos a un hombre y quemamos sus ropas porque su aspecto era una afrenta contra el Exaltado... todavía puedo oler a tela quemada».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne me souviens pas de tout. Je crois... que nous avons tiré sur des gens. Ou plutôt, au-dessus de leur tête. Quelqu'un avait manqué de respect envers nous. Ensuite, vous avez déclaré que le pilotage de navette était un jeu d'enfant et que vous étiez {mf|prêt|prête} à parier votre lettre de marque que vous pourriez nous conduire au vaisseau. Nous avons aussi déshabillé un homme et mis le feu à ses vêtements parce que leur simple vue était une offense à l'Exalté... Je sens encore l'odeur du tissu brûlé. »
languages.original_text: "I don't remember all of it. I think... We shot at some people. Over their heads. Someone didn't offer us the required amount of respect. Then you said that flying a shuttle was easy and that you would bet your Warrant that you could get us to the ship. We also stripped a man and burnt his clothes because the sight of them offended the Exalted One... I can still smell the singed fibres now."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne me souviens pas de tout. Je crois... que nous avons tiré sur des gens. Ou plutôt, au-dessus de leur tête. Quelqu'un avait manqué de respect envers nous. Ensuite, vous avez déclaré que le pilotage de navette était un jeu d'enfant et que vous étiez {mf|prêt|prête} à parier votre lettre de marque que vous pourriez nous conduire au vaisseau. Nous avons aussi déshabillé un homme et mis le feu à ses vêtements parce que leur simple vue était une offense à l'Exalté... Je sens encore l'odeur du tissu brûlé. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich erinnere mich an nichts. Ich glaube ... Wir schossen auf Leute. Über ihre Köpfe. Irgendwer brachte uns nicht den nötigen Respekt entgegen. Dann meintet Ihr, dass es einfach sei, ein Shuttle zu fliegen und dass Ihr Euren Handelsbrief darauf verwetten würdet, dass Ihr uns zum Schiff bringen könnt. Außerdem entblößten wir einen Mann und verbrannten seine Kleidung, weil sein Anblick den Erhabenen beleidigte... Ich habe immer noch die angesengten Fasern in der Nase."
languages.original_text: "I don't remember all of it. I think... We shot at some people. Over their heads. Someone didn't offer us the required amount of respect. Then you said that flying a shuttle was easy and that you would bet your Warrant that you could get us to the ship. We also stripped a man and burnt his clothes because the sight of them offended the Exalted One... I can still smell the singed fibres now."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erinnere mich an nichts. Ich glaube ... Wir schossen auf Leute. Über ihre Köpfe. Irgendwer brachte uns nicht den nötigen Respekt entgegen. Dann meintet Ihr, dass es einfach sei, ein Shuttle zu fliegen und dass Ihr Euren Handelsbrief darauf verwetten würdet, dass Ihr uns zum Schiff bringen könnt. Außerdem entblößten wir einen Mann und verbrannten seine Kleidung, weil sein Anblick den Erhabenen beleidigte... Ich habe immer noch die angesengten Fasern in der Nase."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Tamamını hatırlamıyorum. Sanırım... Birilerine ateş ettik. Kafalarının üstüne. Birisi bize gereken saygıyı göstermemişti. Sonra mekik uçurmanın kolay olduğu ve bizi gemiye ulaştırabileceğin konusunda Ruhsatname üzerine bahse girebileceğini söyledin. Ayrıca bir adamın kıyafetlerini soyduk ve onları yaktık çünkü görüntüsü, Görkemli'ye hakaret gibiydi. Yanmış kumaşların kokusunu hâlâ alabiliyorum."
languages.original_text: "I don't remember all of it. I think... We shot at some people. Over their heads. Someone didn't offer us the required amount of respect. Then you said that flying a shuttle was easy and that you would bet your Warrant that you could get us to the ship. We also stripped a man and burnt his clothes because the sight of them offended the Exalted One... I can still smell the singed fibres now."
